name: HELMIBOND 867
description: HELMIBOND 867 is a solvent-free, acrylic adhesive formulated to permanently install luxury vinyl tile and plank flooring, resilient sheet vinyl flooring, rubber tile flooring and rubber sheet flooring and rubber and vinyl stair treads. To insure product stability and reduce joint openings, HELMIBOND 867 has been formulated to produce a hard set and firm bond line less susceptible to indentation and telegraphing. May be used over properly prepared porous and non-porous surfaces such as concrete, underlayment grade plywood, cementitious based patching compounds and levelers.
